## Block.removeListOfValues() method

Remove LOV from field(s)

**Signature:**

```typescript
removeListOfValues(field: string | string[]): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  field | string \| string\[\] | The name of the field or an array of field names to remove the LOV from. |

void
